His RAFT Inc. / Interfaith Food Bank

INFORMATION

Find out more about us.

His R.A.F.T. is a Central Valley nonprofit corporation that has been serving the community for over 30 years. Our mission is to provide those in our area with the means to serve the underfed.

CONTACT US

Get in touch today

We operate mainly as a distributor to other nonprofit organizations. We do not give directly to the public. We also accept many types of donations from businesses. All donations are tax-deductible.

CONTACT US

We're open from 9am to 2pm (Closed on Thursdays and Sundays)

To discuss donations or recieving food for your nonprofit, speak with John or Diosa at (209) 460-1044. Or email us at hisraft@gmail.com.

You may also complete the form below.

We are permitted to give food only to 501(c)(3) nonprofit organizations. We do not give directly to the public. Contact your local emergency food bank if you are in need.
